[h2][Patreon] 2024 Spring Patreon Campaign Banner Contest![/h2]
[hr]Hi everyone,
Spring is here! Time to come out of winter hibernation and welcome the warming weather. In Japan and many parts of Asia, spring is the time for hanami (lit. flower viewing), where friends and family take in the sights of the annual spring sakura or cherry blossom bloom.
Thank you again to all of our Patreon supporters for keeping us alive. As mentioned during the 2023 Summer campaign, this Spring we will be refilling the AniDB bank account with a new fundraising Patreon post.
[h4]The Contest[/h4]
[hr]Users have the chance to contribute their creativity to the Patron post banner! See the submissions of our 2023 Summer contest here: https://anidb.net/forum/thread/797414
For this contest, submit a spring themed AniDB anime banner! The winning banner will be featured as our 2024 Spring Patreon fundraising post banner. The banner should tie in spring themes with both anime and AniDB.
[spoiler="What does a 'spring theme' entail?"]
The theme centres around spring activities! Both general and Japan-specific spring activities are welcome.
Some illustrative examples include:
1. Melting snow
2. Trees and flowers in bloom
3. Animals and brids coming out of hibernation
4. Hanami / sakura viewing
5. Spring festivals
Etc. This list is non-exhaustive.[/spoiler]
[h4]The Prize[/h4]
[hr]
* The winner will have their banner and username (unless you choose to remain anonymous) featured publicly on our upcoming 2024 Spring Patreon fundraising post.
* The winner will also receive a Creative Content badge on their userpage.
Caption: Participated in a Patreon banner contest
Caption: Participated in a Patreon banner contest (winner on 2024 Spring)

[hr]
* Anyone can participate, both Patrons and regular users.
* The submission period will be open from 2024-Mar-24 Sunday to 2024-Apr-12 Friday.

* If you wish to make an anonymous submission, send an AniDB forum PM to CDB-Man instead.
* The voting period will be from 2024-Apr-13 Saturday to 2024-Apr-21 Sunday. You may vote on as many images as you like.
* If we suspect vote stuffing, then the staff will take this into consideration when looking at the results, and discard entries if needed.

* In the even-more unlikely event of a tie in the runoff vote, the AniDB staff will decide the winner.

* Original content is preferred, remixed content is acceptable.
